title: Ep 26: You Deserve It with Lauren Lapkus
itunes:title: Ep 26: You Deserve It with Lauren Lapkus
itunes:subtitle: Doree and Kate welcome SAG Award-winning actress and comedian Lauren Lapkus (Crashing, Orange Is the New Black) to the pod. She talks about the power of vision boards and manifesting your goals, her obsession with Riley Rose's ad...
description:
Doree and Kate welcome SAG Award-winning actress and comedian Lauren Lapkus (Crashing, Orange Is the New Black) to the pod. She talks about the power of vision boards and manifesting your goals, her obsession with Riley Rose's adorably packaged products, and why she moisturizes her neck.

Plus, Kate discusses her cycle of summer stress and depression, and Doree digs into the challenges of finding an age-appropriate friend group when you don't have kids.

To learn more, visit www.forever35podcast.com.

This episode is sponsored by:

  • Away -- Visit AwayTravel.com/Forever35 (or use Forever35 at checkout) for $20 off.
  • Skylar -- Go to Skylar.com/forever35 to get a sample palette of Skylar’s natural fragrances with free shipping and a $20 credit for your next order.
  • Casper -- For $50 off select mattresses, go to Casper.com/Forever35.
  • Hello Fresh-- For $30 off your first week of HelloFresh, visit hellofresh.com and enter promo code Forever35.


Theme music by Riot.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
